categories: Category:Moffs and Grand Moffs of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Yoren was a Human male Moff of the reconstituted Sith Empire who was captured during the Cold War by the Terror Brigade group on the planet Hoth and offered conditionally to the Galactic Republic.
Despite being described as a Moff, and the fact that the singular position of Grand Moff is already occupied by Rycus Kilran and Ilyan Regus after him, Yoren's carbonite is labeled as "Grand Moff."
